category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 5 (Old Time and Period)
contents: Article 5 (Holding Time and Period) ① In principle, the National Sports Festival is held in October, the National Winter Sports Festival in February, the National Boys Sports Festival in May, and the National Sports Festival in April. . However, in principle, the National Boys Sports Competition will be held from Saturday. Revised on June 16, 2016. ② The period of the National Sports Festival cannot exceed 7 days, the National Winter Sports Competition cannot exceed 4 days, the National Boys Sports Competition cannot exceed 4 days, and the National Life Sports Festival cannot exceed 4 days. Revised on June 16, 2016. ③ The Sports Council may adjust the timing of the sports competitions in years when international sports competitions, such as the Olympic Games or Asian Games, are held in Korea. Revised 2022. 1. 24. ④ Deleted 2017. 8. 28. ⑤ The venue of the National Sports Festival, National Youth Sports Festival, and National Life Sports Festival must determine the competition period and report to the Sports Council by January 31 of the year before the event. . Newly established 2023. 3. 23. [Title revised 2022. 1. 24.]
